page.title: 12Law and Order
page.content: P.C.Tutton is a Beat Officer who came to tell us about the Community Police. Beat officers use a car or walk around in their jobs.His code number is 1272. His code stands for Chelmsford Division.As our Community Policeman he comes to our school to tell us about the Green Cross Code and he shows us films about never going with strangers.His 4 major tasks are to save lives and property,to keep the Queen's Peace and to take people to court. P.C.Tutton has a truncheon made of solid oak.It is very heavy and very dangerous.He uses it to break windows in car crashes but he has never used it as a weapon.A police officer must carry his truncheon at all times.If someone gets knocked over and they have stopped breathing, he will have to give them the kiss of life. {
